byline.contributor: Paula Moura contributed reporting from São Paulo, Brazil, and Vinod Sreeharsha and Mariana Simões from Rio de Janeiro.

abstract: Newly installed Brazilian Pres Michel Temer seeks to resuscitate country's economy, while quelling doubts about his legitimacy.

headline.print_headline: With Impeachment Over, Brazil’s Next Challenge Is Its Flailing Economy
headline.main: With Impeachment Over, Brazil’s Next Challenge Is Its Flailing Economy

snippet: The new president, Michel Temer, must navigate his own controversies and a quarrelsome Congress to lead Latin America’s largest nation out of a deepening fiscal crisis....
lead_paragraph: The new president, Michel Temer, must navigate his own controversies and a quarrelsome Congress to lead Latin America’s largest nation out of a deepening fiscal crisis.
